package.name: ros_csv_extraction
package.description:
A data extraction tool has been created to extract information from ROS "bag" files and convert them into more user-friendly comman-separated-value (CSV) files for use in Excel / Matlab / etc.
The tool is written in the form of a ROS package "data_extract". Thus far, the data extraction tool is compatible with the following ROS message types: * sensor_msgs/Image * sensor_msgs/Imu * sensor_msgs/LaserScan * sensor_msgs/NavSatFix * sensor_msgs/NavSatFix * gps_common/gpsVel * umrr_driver/radar_msg * nav_msgs/Odometry
1.) Extract all compatible topics in a bag file rosrun data_extract extract_all -b path_to_bag_file -o path_to_output_dir 2.) Extract a single topic rosrun data_extraction extract_topic -b path_to_bag_file -o path_to_output_csv_file -t topic_name
The extraction tool will only extract topics of the types listed above.
